alert.note: Alert for Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 13 at 7:30PM CDT until August 13 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of the Texas Panhandle, including the following counties, Gray and Wheeler. * WHEN...Until 1030 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 729 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Briscoe, Wheeler, Mclean, Twitty, New Mobeetie, Kellerville, Allison and Mobeetie. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
